name: Federal Enforcement Code
description:
This law is established to provide a mechanism to enforce federal law regarding building code, vehicle abandonment, and university protections.

Federal Law states that the building code is enforceable starting on Day 4. Enforcement will start at the end of Day 4. Fines will be issued following a warning, if any is given.

No Vertical Farming will be enforced starting on Day 6. The additional time is a grace period to allow farmers more time to move/remove their farms and not disrupt growth cycles of crops. Please note the federation offers federal farming districts, farming loans, and LCPs to farmers for protection of their crop fields.

Vehicle enforcement will begin on the federal highway districts as the highways are constructed. Do not leave your vehicles on the roadway or impeding traffic or construction efforts.

University protections are being put in place to reduce the waste of resources when multiple scrolls are bought in a single transaction without good purpose.

properties.Title: Federal Building Code Violation Notification
properties.UserDescription:
This clause provides the owner of a building in violation of Federal Law, Section III (Public Law), Sub-section 1.(1) to notification that he or she is facing a fine for a building code violation and that the fine will repeat daily until the condition is rectified. Warnings are at the discretion of the inspector. In most cases, a warning should be provided by the official performing the inspection prior to issuing a fine. In egregious or serious cases, the inspector may in his discretion institute a fine without a warning period. 

REQUIREMENTS to issue a fine:
- A physical sign must be placed by the authorized individual performing the inspection prior to assigning the title(s) Building Code Violation or Vertical Farming
- The sign must include the specific violation(s), the date, time, and time-zone of the inspection, and name of inspector. 
- An entry in the discord "Federal Inspector / Building Fines" (or similarly named) thread is required for each violation. 
- The discord entry must include a screenshot of the sign and the violation, the individual or company that owns the property, and a discord ping (if possible) to the affected individual. 

To ISSUE a fine:
- Designated official assigns one of the following titles to the citizen or legal person owning the offending property
a) Building Code Violation to be used on first offense of a building code violation
b) Repeat Building Code Violation to be used on subsequent offense of the building code violations (even if the violation is different than the first)
c) Vertical Farming Violation is to be used in instances of vertical farming.

Repeat violations of vertical farming may use both the "Repeat building code violation" and "vertical farming violation" in combination to increase the fine per day.

properties.Message: WARNING - Your property is in violation of the building code. Please fix the offending violations and contact the inspector. Failure to do so will result in a daily fine.

PeopleToSendTo.contextDescription: The citizen currently being processed for the timer event.

properties.Title: Federal Building Code Violation Fine
properties.UserDescription:
This clause enforces a building code violation fine on the citizen with the offending building code violation, or in the case of a company on the company's legal person. Repeat offenders of building code violations face a higher fine as they should be well aware of the building code. Repeat offenders do not need to receive a warning before facing a fine. A physical sign in a conspicuous location on or near the property in question is still required. The inspector has 24 hours to re-inspect the property once notified that the violation(s) have been fixed and clear the fine.

Failure of the government official to follow the regulations outlined in the Notification Clause and Fine Clause entitles the citizen to a refund of any subsequent fines in that instance. Multiple failures of the government official to follow these regulations may result in termination of official duties.

A citizen may contest a fine under the following circumstances:
- The inspector has taken more than 24 hours to re-inspect and clear the fine upon notification that the violation is fixed. In this instance, the citizen is entitled to a refund of the erroneously collected fine (note this is not the whole fine, just tick(s) that remained after the violation was cleared and the government took no action to lift the fine)
- The inspector has taken more than 72 hours to re-inspect and clear the fine upon notification. In this instance, the citizen is entitled to a full refund of the building code violation.

properties.Title: Vehicle Enforcement
properties.UserDescription: If a vehicle is found to be abandoned on public infrastructure or federal property under the jurisdiction of the federation, it is subject to towing and impound pursuant to Federal Law, Section III. Public Law, Sub-Section 4, Clause 3. This clause provides authorization to the Prime Minister or any individual as delegated or designated by the Prime Minister, to remove the vehicle and place in impoundment. Impoundment will result in a maintenance and storage fee for your vehicle as well as an administrative fine.

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Title: Impounded Vehicle Storage Fee
properties.UserDescription: If a citizen's vehicle has been impounded for violation of Clause 4 above, the citizen will incur a vehicle storage fee for each day the vehicle remains in the impound lot. The citizen will also need to pay the administrative fine of 250 euros to get the vehicle released from the impound lot. Attempts to evade the fine by summoning your vehicle by command will result in a double penalty being applied.

You are being charged a storage fee and an administrative fine related to the towing of your vehicle. You have the right to appeal this administrative act within three days in #federal-court on discord.

properties.Title: University Protection Clause
properties.UserDescription: In order to protect the interests of the Federal University in it's mission to provide efficient and economical manner and to allow the maximum amount of usable scrolls this clause prevents the mass-purchase of multiple types of scrolls. The intent of this clause is to stop people unfamiliar with white tiger concepts and changes from behaving in a way that's negative to the whole server. It does not actually prevent someone from buying multiple scrolls, they just need to buy them one at a time. This clause is not enforced on citizens with more than 2 invested stars of any skill.
